custom_params.label: DNS
custom_params.tooltip: Spore density -- how many particles in the air

custom_params.label: FLT
custom_params.tooltip: Float speed -- how slowly spores drift

custom_params.label: GLM
custom_params.tooltip: Glimmer -- sparkle and shine in the light

custom_params.label: SET
custom_params.tooltip: Settle rate -- how quickly spores fade

custom_params.label: SWR
custom_params.tooltip: Swarm behavior -- clustering and group movement
